医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究表明，高饮食胰岛素指数与代谢不健康风险增加相关研究探讨了伊朗成年人群中膳食胰岛素指数 (DII) 和膳食胰岛素负荷 (DIL) 与代谢健康 (MH) 状态以及脑源性神经营养因子 (BDNF) 和 adropin 血清水平之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231124/High-dietary-insulin-index-linked-with-increased-risk-of-metabolic-unhealthiness-research-show.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231124/High-dietary-insulin-index-linked-with-increased-risk-of-metabolic-unhealthiness-research-show.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1707dc67-ada6-4352-908e-cd4bdcbb987f Fri, 24 Nov 2023 11:26:00 -0500 High dietary insulin index associated with increased risk of metabolic unhealthiness, research show
热休克蛋白保护细菌免受等离子体处理热休克蛋白可保护细胞免受蛋白质聚集。然而，随着治疗时间的延长，它会降解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231124/Heat-shock- Protein-protects-bacteria-from-plasma-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231124/Heat-shock- Protein-protects-bacteria-from-plasma-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=36fb3cfb-c89e-4fe8-b160-67ade926db65 Fri, 24 Nov 2023 11:05:16 -0500 Heat shock protein protects bacteria from plasma treatment
Ingenza 和 Phibro Ethanol 加速绿色燃料转型Ingenza 和 Phibro 乙醇（Phibro 动物保健公司的一个部门）联手设计了一种新型酵母菌株，该菌株将在具有挑战性和传统的环境条件下提高生物乙醇商业生产的产量，进一步推动向清洁生物燃料的转变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231124/Ingenza-and-Phibro-Ethanol-accelerate-the-green-fuel-transition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231124/Ingenza-and-Phibro-Ethanol-accelerate-the-green-fuel-transition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cbd43866-7d04-4506-a31a-f1cce7fba406 Fri, 24 Nov 2023 10:57:00 -0500 Ingenza and Phibro Ethanol accelerate the green fuel transition
研究人员确定了检查点抑制剂诱导的黑色素瘤细胞过度进展的生物标志物杜克癌症研究所的研究人员发现了潜在的生物标志物，可以预测检查点抑制剂药物产生适得其反的可能性，从而推动黑色素瘤细胞的过度进展，而不是释放免疫系统来对抗它们。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231124/Researchers-identify-biomarkers-for-checkpoint-inhibitor-induced-hyperprogression-of-melanoma-cells-November-22-2022-7c.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231124/Researchers-identify-biomarkers-for-checkpoint-inhibitor-induced-hyperprogression-of-melanoma-cells-November-22-2022-7c.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f5ee4d30-446c-4ced-8d39-66129c4ab3bb Fri, 24 Nov 2023 10:56:00 -0500 Researchers identify biomarkers for checkpoint inhibitor-induced hyperprogression of melanoma cells
研究表明帕金森病是冠状动脉疾病和中风的潜在致病因素研究人员进行了两个样本的孟德尔随机化（MR）分析，以探讨帕金森病（PD）与心脑血管疾病之间的因果关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231124/Parkinsons-disease-a-潜在-致病-因子-for-coronary-artery-disease-and-中风-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231124/Parkinsons-disease-a-潜在-致病-因子-for-coronary-artery-disease-and-中风-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8b2eea43-2b0d-4e99-86f3-8b721808d60c Fri, 24 Nov 2023 07:42:00 -0500 Parkinson's disease a potential pathogenetic factor for coronary artery disease and stroke, study suggests
石榴的力量：研究显示对心血管和糖尿病健康有希望研究人员回顾了石榴 (Punica granatum l., PG) 多酚对代谢紊乱的生物调节作用的现有数据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231124/Pomegranates-power-Studies-show-promise-in-cardioangiography-and-diabetic-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231124/Pomegranates-power-Studies-show-promise-in-cardioangiography-and-diabetic-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=abbe956d-869c-4018-a224-26f33821da66 Fri, 24 Nov 2023 07:05:00 -0500 Pomegranate's power: Studies show promise in cardiovascular and diabetic health
研究表明超加工食品消费与头颈癌风险增加有关最近《欧洲营养杂志》的一项研究探讨了食用超加工食品 (UPF) 引起的食管腺癌 (OAC) 和头颈癌 (HNC) 的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231124/Study-links-ultra-processed-food-conspiration-to-increased-risk-of-head-and-neck-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231124/Study-links-ultra-processed-food-conspiration-to-increased-risk-of-head-and-neck-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4ac79de1-e349-4aa6-bf0a-8a976d2b9917 Fri, 24 Nov 2023 06:32:00 -0500 Study links ultra-processed food consumption to increased risk of head and neck cancers
麻省理工学院及其合作者开发的用于非侵入式睡眠障碍监测的新型可摄入传感器Device 最近的一项研究报告了一种可摄入生命体征监测药丸（VM 药丸）在监测生命体征（包括基于人体试验的心率和呼吸频率）方面的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231124/New-ingestible-sensor-for-non-intrusive-sleep-disorder-monitoring-development-by-MIT-and-collaborators.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231124/New-ingestible-sensor-for-non-intrusive-sleep-disorder-monitoring-development-by-MIT-and-collaborators.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=07ff7706-1882-453f-b2b2-8e84dd066037 Fri, 24 Nov 2023 06:08:00 -0500 New ingestible sensor for non-intrusive sleep disorder monitoring developed by MIT and collaborators
对平权行动的强烈反对打击了针对黑人妇女的开创性孕产妇保健计划对于旧金山一位年轻的黑人母亲布里安娜·琼斯来说，一个名为“丰盛生育计划”的城市计划是天赐之物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231124/Backlash-to-affirmative-action-hits-pioneering-maternal-health-program-for-Black-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231124/Backlash-to-affirmative-action-hits-pioneering-maternal-health-program-for-Black-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a934fe18-bc59-4b9e-8a2b-a930167d6fda Fri, 24 Nov 2023 05:40:37 -0500 Backlash to affirmative action hits pioneering maternal health program for Black women
研究表明，COVID-19 疫苗可提供针对长期影响的保护《BMJ》的一项新研究探讨了疫苗接种可以在多大程度上避免 PCC。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231124/COVID-19-vaccines-offer-protection-against-long-term-effects-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231124/COVID-19-vaccines-offer-protection-against-long-term-effects-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39832739-ab33-44fc-b5fe-43532ebfca78 Fri, 24 Nov 2023 05:39:00 -0500 COVID-19 vaccines offer protection against long-term effects, study suggests
